about_the_game:
This game is an arcade game about a space ship called 'the Falcon'. The mission is simple: land the Falcon vertically! Try to use your fuel as efficiently as possible and land safely.

Throughout the 5 sectors, which contain 12 levels each, you'll encounter obstacles such as asteroids and curious UFOs.

This game is based on the game (Timesplitters 2) Astrolander. It has a minimalistic style that brings back the feeling of the Arcade era.

Play the game using your keyboard or an X-box controller.

This game is based on the game (Timesplitters 2) Astrolander. It has a minimalistic style that brings back the feeling of the Arcade era.

Play the game using your keyboard or an X-box controller.
name: FalconLander

short_description: The mission is simple: land the Falcon! Try to use your fuel as efficiently as possible and land safely. This Arcade game is easy to start and fun to play! Back to the basics with the minimalistic style that still knows how to catch the players attention.
